name: Gynii Me
slogan: A digital healthcare platform focusing on fertility
description:
We support prospective fertility patients via one of three routes:

1) Improved fertility awareness

Our aim is to dispel the myths, misconceptions and general confusion about fertility treatment. By providing clear, transparent and medically-approved information, we ensure that individuals and couples have the right information to make informed fertility decisions.

Gynii Me’s fertility awareness programmes are tailored to guide individual patients through their own personal fertility journey.

2) Selecting the right fertility clinic

Our online algorithm compares fertility clinics using a range of metrics such as a clinic's facilities, size, doctors’ specific expertise and clinic success rates. Our platform allows users to search and compare fertility clinics, to choose the clinic that is right for them.

3) High-end fertility services

jobs.title: Marketing executive
jobs.description:
Gynii Me is looking to recruit an intern with excellent analytical and communication skills to provide research assistance to the team.

The role is for a student with a mandate for up to 20 hours per week, although this is flexible depending on the candidate. We are looking for a candidate willing to commit for a longer period. You will be part of a committed and professional international team.

Our internship programme will provide with you an intensive learning experience including:

Exposure to senior management
You will be working hands-on with live projects and will be assigned specific responsibilities
You will get the chance to gain unique insights into the fertility industry
We will provide structured feedback and intensive mentoring throughout the internship to ensure you get the most out of your experience
